WTW0G_bento_claim_codex_description: CYZΞD is regularly updated so you can always find the latest game changes.
WTW0G_bento_claim_data_description: Create your own services using the same data powering CYZΞD. Unlock advanced dashboards, clear documentation and access to premium support for bespoke integration.
WTW0G_bento_claim_leaderboard_descriptio: Submit your top cycles and advance to higher ranks through a fair voting system.
WTW0G_bento_claim_library_description: Save your gameplay and analyze your skills.
WTW0G_bento_claim_performance_descriptio: Improve timings with a personalized plan.
WTW0G_tethys_system_codex_description: Discover her dedicated entry in the resonators hub.
WTW0G_tethys_system_description: Explore tools for translation and let melody modulation inspire your creativity.
WTW0G_tethys_system_modulate_description: Create your own composition with Shorekeeper's piano.
WTW0G_tethys_system_translate_descriptio: Decipher your texts from and to Solaris-3 script.
WTW0G_tethys_system_translate_title: Convert and use Wuthering Waves alphabet

combo_page_description: A combo is a specific, repeatable sequence that a character performs using a defined build and inputs under certain conditions.
condition_self: On self: e.g., Attack Up, Energy ≥ threshold
condition_target: On target: e.g., Vulnerable, Stunned, Elemental status
cycle_bridge_notes: Transfer status and set up burst
cycle_definition_title: Cycles, an innovative combo showcase system
cycle_name_e_g_encore_quick_swap_rotatio: Cycle Name (e.g., Encore Quick Swap Rotation)
cycle_page_description: A cycle is multiple combos executed in sequence using 1 to the game's maximum number of unique character + build combinations.
cycle_plan_description: Draft which characters/builds appear and how many times, ensuring constraints are respected.

default.pp_intro_text: This Privacy Policy outlines how the platform collects, uses, and safeguards your personal data. By accessing or using the platform, you consent to the data practices described herein.
default.pp_collection_intro: The platform collects the following categories of information:
default.pp_collection_account_text: Email address, username, display name, and profile details.
default.pp_collection_usage_text: Pages accessed, features utilized, time spent on platform, and user interaction patterns.
default.pp_collection_technical_text: IP address, browser type and version, device information, operating system, and cookie identifiers.
default.pp_cookies_intro: The platform uses cookies to enhance functionality and improve user experience:
default.pp_cookies_functional_text: Essential for language preferences, user settings, session management, and anonymous analytics.
default.pp_cookies_external_text: External cookies are set by Stripe for processing donations (all payments are considered voluntary donations) and Mux for video playback functionality.
default.pp_usage_item1: Provide, maintain, and enhance platform services
default.pp_usage_item2: Process donations and manage user accounts
default.pp_usage_item3: Communicate service updates, features, and support responses
default.pp_usage_item4: Analyze usage patterns to optimize user experience
default.pp_usage_item5: Detect, prevent, and address security threats and technical issues
default.pp_sharing_intro: Your information may be shared only under these circumstances:
default.pp_sharing_item1: With trusted service providers such as Stripe (payment processing) and Mux (video hosting) who assist in platform operations
default.pp_sharing_item2: When legally required or to comply with legal processes and government requests
default.pp_sharing_item3: To protect the rights, property, safety, and security of the platform, its users, or the public
default.pp_rights_intro: Under applicable data protection regulations, you have the following rights:
default.pp_rights_access_text: Request a copy of all personal data held about you.
default.pp_rights_rectification_text: Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete information.
default.pp_rights_erasure_text: Request deletion of your personal data (subject to legal obligations).
default.pp_rights_portability_text: Request transfer of your data to another service provider.
default.pp_rights_objection_text: Object to certain types of data processing activities.
default.pp_rights_contact__: To exercise any of these rights, please contact support at {_}.
default.pp_retention_text: Personal data is retained only for as long as necessary to fulfill service purposes or comply with legal requirements. Account data is deleted within 30 days of deletion requests, except where retention is legally mandated.
default.pp_security_text: The platform employs industry-standard security measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. However, no internet transmission or electronic storage method is completely secure.
default.pp_children_text: Users must meet the minimum age required by applicable law in their jurisdiction, or have explicit parental or guardian consent and supervision. If you believe underage data has been collected without proper authorization, please contact support immediately.
default.pp_changes_text: The platform reserves the right to update this Privacy Policy at any time. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated effective date. Continued use of the platform after modifications constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.
default.pp_contact_text__: For questions, concerns, or requests regarding this Privacy Policy or your personal data, please contact {_}.
default.tos_acceptance_text: By accessing or using this platform, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please discontinue use immediately.
default.tos_eligibility_text: You must meet the minimum age required by law in your jurisdiction to use this platform independently, or have explicit parental or guardian consent and supervision. All monetary transactions on the platform are considered voluntary donations to support platform operations.
default.tos_account_text: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and all activities occurring under your account. Notify the platform immediately of any unauthorized access or security breaches.
default.tos_conduct_intro: Users agree to maintain respectful and lawful conduct. Prohibited activities include:
default.tos_conduct_item1: Violating applicable laws, regulations, or third-party rights
default.tos_conduct_item2: Infringing upon intellectual property or proprietary rights of others
default.tos_conduct_item3: Uploading or transmitting viruses, malware, or other harmful code
default.tos_conduct_item4: Harassing, threatening, abusing, or causing harm to other users
default.tos_conduct_item5: Disrupting, interfering with, or compromising platform functionality or security
default.tos_content_license: By uploading or sharing content on this platform, you grant the platform a worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free, perpetual, and irrevocable license to use, reproduce, modify, adapt, distribute, publicly display, and promote such content for platform operations and to positively showcase creators and their contributions to the community.
default.tos_content_responsibility: You represent and warrant that you own or possess all necessary rights to content you upload, and that such content does not violate any laws, regulations, or third-party rights.
default.tos_intellectual_text: All platform content, including but not limited to trademarks, logos, designs, and proprietary materials (excluding user-generated and third-party content), are owned by or licensed to the platform. Unauthorized use, reproduction, or distribution is strictly prohibited without prior written permission.
default.tos_termination_text: The platform reserves the right to suspend or terminate user accounts at any time, with or without notice, for violations of these Terms of Service, suspicious activity, or at the platform's sole discretion to protect the community.
default.tos_disclaimer_text: This platform is provided on an 'as is' and 'as available' basis without warranties of any kind, either express or implied. The platform does not guarantee uninterrupted, secure, or error-free service.
default.tos_limitation_text: To the maximum extent permitted by applicable law, the platform shall not be held liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, punitive, or exemplary damages arising from or related to your use of the platform.
default.tos_changes_text: The platform reserves the right to modify these Terms of Service at any time. Updates will be posted with an effective date, and become binding immediately upon posting. Continued platform use after modifications constitutes acceptance of the revised terms.
default.tos_contact_text__: For questions or concerns regarding these Terms of Service, please contact {_}.
default.web_disclaimer: This is an unofficial resource for the game Wuthering Waves by Kuro Games, their assets are used to enhance the experience for fans and gamers.
default.seo_character_guide_desc: Complete guide for {name} in {game}. Find builds, skills, teams, combos, and recommendations.
default.seo_cycle_desc: Watch {creator}'s combo cycle "{tag}" for {game}. Featuring {count} combo{s} with detailed input sequences and video demonstration.
default.seo_builds_desc: View and explore {username}'s character builds for Wuthering Waves. Complete equipment setups including weapons, echoes, and stats.
default.seo_games_desc: Explore game guides, character builds, and combo strategies for Wuthering Waves, 2XKO, and more.
